pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, March 22, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, March 22, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Budget Speech, to be delivered by the Minister of Finance in the House of Commons.
